subject: Re: [junit] Re: Stop me from being bad: Functional testing w/junit OK?
msgSnippet: ... I highly recommend HTMLUnit. -- J. B. Rainsberger, Diaspar Software Services http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416 791-8603 Let s write software that
messageBody:
Chad Woolley wrote:

> jlindwall wrote:
>
> >> Is it against the laws of nature to do something more then unit
> >> testing with junit?
>
> N. JWebUnit (http://jwebunit.sourceforge.net/) is a great tool to do
> functional
> testing of web apps within a JUnit-type environment.

I highly recommend HTMLUnit.
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416 791-8603
Let's write software that people understand
